title: The Omni-Release Strategy
description: Simultaneous release of major ecosystem pillars: FerroTeX (v0.18.0), IPFS for Dart (v1.5.1), and UE5-MCP (v0.6.0). Establishing the foundation for decentralized desktop automation.

title: Creative Automation Breakthrough
description: Pioneered the 'Creative Context Protocol' by launching MCP servers for Blender and Godot, enabling natural language control over 3D pipelines and game engine logic.

title: SeedSphere Launch
description: Released v1.0.1 of SeedSphere, a robust tracking health validation addon for Stremio, deployed via Fly.io to enhance decentralized media reliability.

title: Decentralized Foundations
description: Deep R&D into distributed systems, resulting in the core architecture for 'p2plib-dart' and 'ipfs_client_flutter', processing the building blocks for the future unified ecosystem.
